overview: On January 28, 2014, the American artist Miley Cyrus performed in the show from Los Angeles. The show aired the next day on MTV. Songs: Do My Thang / Get It Right / SMS (Bangerz) / Adore You / Drive / Jolene / Rooting For My Baby / Wrecking Ball / Medley: Don't Tell Me / We Can't Stop (ft. Madonna)
title: Miley Cyrus: MTV Unplugged
